snippet.title: Dwarf Fortress Steam Version - First Look Gameplay & Dev Commentary
snippet.description:
Note: UI is still WIP and not indicative of the final look.

The deepest, most intricate simulation of a world that's ever been created. The legendary Dwarf Fortress is now on Steam. Build a fortress and try to help your dwarves survive, OR adventure as a single hero against a deeply generated world. As seen on the 2020 Guerrilla Collective Showcase.

Featuring a first look at world generation and dwarves, with developer commentary by Tarn Adams of Bay 12 Games.

Dwarf Fortress on Steam: http://bit.ly/2DJ9pXp
Bay 12 Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bay12Games

------------------------------------------

🦊 Subscribe for Kitfox videos: http://bit.ly/37kJjXF 🦊
